panels.description: Note that this table shows the average values for the entire period selected in the dashboard. Consequently, it may contain information about Pods or namespaces that were changed or deleted during the selected period.

targets.expr: max by (job, namespace, controller, controller_name) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range]))

sum by (controller) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range]) * on (controller_type, controller_name) group_left() sum by (controller_type, controller_name) (avg_over_time(vpa_target_recommendation{namespace="$namespace", update_mode="Off"}[$__range]))) * 0
or
sum by (controller) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range]) * on (controller_type, controller_name) group_left() sum by (controller_type, controller_name) (avg_over_time(vpa_target_recommendation{namespace="$namespace", update_mode="Initial"}[$__range]))) * 0 + 1
or
sum by (controller) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range]) * on (controller_type, controller_name) group_left() sum by (controller_type, controller_name) (avg_over_time(vpa_target_recommendation{namespace="$namespace", update_mode="Auto"}[$__range]))) * 0 + 2
or
sum by (controller) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range]) * on (controller_type, controller_name) group_left() sum by (controller_type, controller_name) (avg_over_time(vpa_target_recommendation{namespace="$namespace", update_mode="Recreate"}[$__range]))) * 0 + 3
or
sum by (controller) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) * 0 + 5

sum by (controller) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range]) * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__range])))
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller)
  (
    avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])
    * on (pod) group_left()
    sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",unit="core",node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
  )
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller)
  (
    avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])
    * on (controller_type, controller_name) group_left()
    sum by(controller_type, controller_name) (avg_over_time(vpa_target_recommendation{container!="POD",namespace="$namespace", resource="cpu"}[$__range]))
  ) 
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller)
  (
    avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])
    * on (namespace, pod) group_left()
    sum by (namespace, pod)
      (
        (
          sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",unit="core",node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
          -
          sum by(namespace, pod, container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
        ) > 0
      )
  )
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller)
  (
    avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])
    * on (namespace, pod) group_left()
    sum by (namespace, pod)
      (
        (
          (
            sum by(namespace, pod, container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
            -
            sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",unit="core",node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
          ) or sum by(namespace, pod, container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
        ) > 0
      )
  )
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range]) * on (pod) group_left() ((sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])) / sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))) * sum by (pod) (rate(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu",unit="core",node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))))
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range]) * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__range])))
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller)
  (
    avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])
    * on (pod) group_left()
    sum by (namespace, pod)
      (
        avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",unit="byte",node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__range])
      )
    )
  or
  count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller)
  (
    avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])
    * on (controller_type, controller_name) group_left()
    sum by(controller_type, controller_name) (avg_over_time(vpa_target_recommendation{container!="POD",namespace="$namespace", resource="memory"}[$__range]))
  ) 
  or  
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller)
  (
    avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])
    * on (namespace, pod) group_left()
    sum by (namespace, pod)
      (
        (
          sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",unit="byte",node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
          -
          sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
        ) > 0
      )
  )
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller)
  (
    avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])
    * on (namespace, pod) group_left()
    sum by (namespace, pod)
      (
        (
          (
            sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
            -
            sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",unit="byte",node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
          ) or sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
        ) > 0
      )
  )
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range]) * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])))
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range]) * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_fs_writes_total{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])))
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

max by (controller) (max by (namespace, controller_type, controller_name, controller) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) * on (namespace, controller_type, controller_name) group_left() max by (namespace, controller_type, controller_name) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_replicas{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])))
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

max by (job, namespace, controller_type, controller_name, controller) ((max by (job, namespace, controller_type, controller_name, controller) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range]))) *  on (job, namespace, controller_type, controller_name) group_right(controller)
(avg_over_time(kube_controller_replicas[$__range]) - avg_over_time(kube_controller_replicas_ready[$__range])))
or
max by (job, namespace, controller_type, controller_name, controller) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) * 0

sum by (controller) 
  (
    avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])
    * on (pod) group_left()
    sum by (pod) (increase(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
  )
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range]) * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(container_memory:kmem{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__range])))
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

panels.title: Controllers

targets.expr: kube_controller_replicas_ready{namespace=~"$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller_type != "ReplicaSet", controller_name=~"$controller"}/kube_controller_replicas{namespace=~"$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller_type != "ReplicaSet", controller_name=~"$controller"}*100

panels.description: The number of Pods controlled by the Controller
panels.title: Pods count

targets.expr: sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.description: The total value may not equal the sum of system and user times because of the kernel's cgroup accounting peculiarities. Read more here: https://www.kernel.org/doc/Documentation/cgroup-v1/cpuacct.txt

targets.expr: sum (sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_system_seconds_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))))

sum (sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_user_seconds_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))))

panels.title: Usage by state

panels.description: This graph shows the requested CPU resources higher than the actual CPU consumption. In other words, it shows CPU resources that can be "freed" without affecting the service.
panels.title: Over-requested by controller

panels.description: This graph shows the requested CPU resources lower than the actual CPU consumption. In other words, it shows CPU resources that need to be "reserved" for the service to run smoothly.
panels.title: Under-requested by controller

panels.description: The absence of data on the graph means that container resources are not set

targets.expr: sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() ((sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))) * sum by (pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu",unit="core",node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"})))

panels.title: Throttling

targets.expr: sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.description: The total value may not equal the sum of system and user times because of the kernel's cgroup accounting peculiarities. Read more here: https://www.kernel.org/doc/Documentation/cgroup-v1/cpuacct.txt

targets.expr: sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_system_seconds_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_user_seconds_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: $controller

panels.description: The Working set bytes metric is the actual memory used by the container, as it includes active file memory. When its value approaches the limit, the container can be killed by the OOM killer. This value can be higher than the sum RSS and Cache since not all active file memory is Cache.
panels.title: Usage by state

panels.description: This graph shows the requested Memory resources higher than the actual Memory consumption. In other words, it shows Memory resources that can be "freed" without affecting the service.
panels.title: Over-requested by controller

panels.description: This graph shows the requested Memory resources higher than the actual Memory consumption. In other words, it shows Memory resources that need to be "reserved" for the service to run smoothly.

targets.expr:
sum by (controller)
  (
    kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}
    * on (namespace, pod) group_left()
    sum by (namespace, pod)
      (
        (
          (
            sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
            -
            sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",unit="byte",node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
          )
          or
          (
            sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
            +
            sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(container_memory:kmem{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
          )
        ) > 0
      )
  )

panels.title: Under-requested by controller

panels.description: The Working set bytes metric is the actual memory used by the container, as it includes active file memory. When its value approaches the limit, the container can be killed by the OOM killer. This value can be higher than the sum RSS and Cache since not all active file memory is Cache.
panels.title: $controller

panels.description: This graph shows Network Receive (except for the hostNetwork Pods)

targets.expr:
# Data rate for the controller is a sum of data rates of its Pods.
sum by (controller) (
  # Select Pods by controller_type and controller.
  kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"} 
  * on (pod)
  group_left() # Preserve controller label from the 'kube_controller_pod' metric.
  (
    # Select Pods with hostNetwork: false.
    kube_pod_info{host_network="false",namespace="$namespace"}
    * on(pod)
    # Sum data rate for all interfaces in the Pod. 
    sum by (pod) (rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
  )
)

panels.title: Receive

panels.description: This graph shows Network Transmit (except for the hostNetwork Pods)

targets.expr:
# Data rate for the controller is a sum of data rates of its Pods.
sum by (controller) (
  # Select Pods by controller_type and controller.
  kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"} 
  * on (pod)
  group_left() # Preserve controller label from the 'kube_controller_pod' metric.
  (
    # Select Pods with hostNetwork: false.
    kube_pod_info{host_network="false",namespace="$namespace"}
    * on(pod)
    # Sum data rate for all interfaces in the Pod. 
    sum by (pod) (rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
  )
)

panels.title: Transmit

targets.expr: sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_fs_writes_total{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.description: This graph does not show any localstorage-related information due to incorrectly calculating the occupied space on localstorage disks

targets.expr:
sum (
  sum by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
    max_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes{namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
  ) 
  * 
  sum by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
    label_replace(
      max_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]),
      "persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)")
    + on (persistentvolume) group_left() max by (persistentvolume) (kube_persistentvolume_is_local == 0)

  )
  unless
  sum by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
    max_over_time(kube_pod_spec_volumes_persistentvolumeclaims_info{namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
  ) 
) 
and (count (kube_node_info) == count (kube_node_info{node=~"$node"}))

panels.title: PVC Provisioned (except local storage classes)

panels.description: This graph does not show any localstorage-related information due to incorrectly calculating the occupied space on localstorage disks
panels.title: PVC Usage (except local storage classes)

panels.description: This graph does not show any localstorage-related information due to incorrectly calculating the occupied space on localstorage disks

targets.expr:
sum by (namespace, controller) (
  max by (namespace, controller, persistentvolumeclaim)
  (
    sum by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
        max_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]) - max_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
    ) 

    * max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
      label_replace(
        max_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]),
        "persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)")
      + on (persistentvolume) group_left() max by (persistentvolume) (kube_persistentvolume_is_local == 0)
    )

        * on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_left(pod) 
    max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim, pod) (
         max_over_time(kube_pod_spec_volumes_persistentvolumeclaims_info{namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
    ) 

       * on (namespace, pod) group_left(controller)
      kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"} 
  )
)
/
sum by (namespace, controller) (
  max by (namespace, controller, persistentvolumeclaim)
  (
    sum by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
        max_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
    ) 

    * max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
      label_replace(
        max_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]),
        "persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)")
      + on (persistentvolume) group_left() max by (persistentvolume) (kube_persistentvolume_is_local == 0)
    )

        * on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_left(pod) 
    max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim, pod) (
         max_over_time(kube_pod_spec_volumes_persistentvolumeclaims_info{namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
    ) 

       * on (namespace, pod) group_left(controller)
      kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"} 
  )
)

panels.title: PVC Usage in % (except local storage classes)

targets.expr:
max by (persistentvolumeclaim) (
  (max_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]) - max_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
  / 
  max_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])
)

max by (persistentvolumeclaim) (
  max_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_inodes_used{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]) 
  / 
  max_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_inodes{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])
)
